definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The device was researched and designed to confine the vertical rotary shafting of large photoelectric instrumentations.
sentences.chinese: 该限位机构用于限制大型光电设备垂直轴系的旋转。

sentences.english: The vertical axis ranges from strategic to tactical.
Time labels the vertical axis of the above plot, and frequency marks the horizontal axis.
sentences.chinese: 上图中，垂直轴表示时间，水平轴表示频率。

sentences.english: Radiation is zero in direction along the axis normal to the plane of a loop current.
sentences.chinese: 环形电流面之垂直轴方向无辐射。

sentences.english: The two different configurations are horizontal axis and vertical access wind machines.
sentences.chinese: 两种不同的结构是水平轴和垂直轴。

sentences.english: The CH2 vertical axis input jack.
Rotate the gyro ball continually along vertical axis.
sentences.chinese: 把陀螺球绕垂直轴连续地转动。

sentences.english: Its showpiece: four power-generating vertical-axis wind turbines.
sentences.chinese: 四台垂直轴风力涡轮机是这座大厦的一大特色。

sentences.english: It tells you it is rotating about a vertical axis.
The CH1 vertical axis input jack.
Otherwise the perpendicular axis theorem doesn't work.
sentences.chinese: 否则垂直轴定理不能应用。

sentences.english: How does the phenomenon change when the container rotates about its vertical axis?
sentences.chinese: 如果容器绕垂直轴旋转，这个现象会发生什么变化呢？

sentences.english: The tower would also be powered by vertical axis wind turbines placed in between the floors of the central tower.
sentences.chinese: 放置在楼层间的垂直轴风力机也为大厦提供电能。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump)/reciprocating motion
